name: Thai Bamboo Shoot Curry Recipe (Gaeng Phed Nor Mai)
description: Easy Thai bamboo shoots curry recipe, or gaeng phed nor mai. Serve with rice for dinner!

recipeInstructions.text: Add 3.40 fl oz/100ml of your coconut milk in a wok over medium heat. Simmer until the sides start to bubble. The coconut oil will naturally separate and rise to the surface.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 3.40 fl oz/100ml of your coconut milk in a wok over medium heat. Simmer until the sides start to bubble. The coconut oil will naturally separate and rise to the surface.

recipeInstructions.text: Once you see the coconut oil create a separate layer, stir in your red curry paste. Mix well with the coconut milk and follow up with your remaining milk, mix well once more.
recipeInstructions.name: Once you see the coconut oil create a separate layer, stir in your red curry paste. Mix well with the coconut milk and follow up with your remaining milk, mix well once more.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sliced beef, bamboo shoots, palm sugar, and fish sauce. Cook until the beef is done and make sure the palm sugar is fully dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sliced beef, bamboo shoots, palm sugar, and fish sauce. Cook until the beef is done and make sure the palm sugar is fully dissolved.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the heat and stir in your sliced chilies, sweet basil, and kaffir lime leaves. Serve immediately with rice. Enjoy!
